attributes.description:
KIA PICANTO 1.0 MT STREET PE
Stunning Picanto Street in fantastic condition. Full service history. Central locking, airbag, aircon, radio with bluetooth and USB. Electric windows and mirrors. Reverse camera and sensors to assist with parking. Power steering with controls on steering wheel. Manual transmission and gives a smooth drive to all your destinations. Great fuel consumption. Visit your KIA Konfidence dealership in the Westrand, situated in Wilropark, Roodepoort and book this car for a test drive. Trade ins accepted. Nationwide delivery.

attributes.description:
Finding a high quality, reliable pre-owned vehicle can be complicated. That’s why Kia Northcliff offers a straightforward, risk-free solution to purchasing your next pre-owned vehicle. We take pride in the quality of our pre-owned vehicles by thoroughly inspecting and ensuring their roadworthiness, authenticating service history, and verifying mileages.

Kia Konfidence is backed by Kia Motors South Africa, and supported by a nationwide dealer network that ensures excellent trade-in evaluations and nation-wide delivery.

You can also choose from a wide range of vehicle finance options through Kia Financial Services. Add to this a premium customer experience, and you are guaranteed many happy kilometers for years to come. Flexible finance option to suit any budget engage with our experienced trustworthy team today.

Features: Keyless Start,  Leather Upholstery, electric seat, camera for park distance control, cruise control, and much much more!
Don't miss out! Visit us Today!

Service Plan - 5 years or 90,000km (whichever occurs first)
Service Plan Intervals - Every 15,000km
Warranty - 4 years or 120,000km (whichever occurs first)

We offer a range of Ford specific EXTENDED as well as NEW Warranties and Service Plans. With such a variety, you are guaranteed to find a Warranty and Service Plan that will suit your individual needs as a motorist.
